Class RefillBulletAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
      • game.RefillBulletAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.ActionInterface

    public class RefillBulletAction
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
    A class which represents an action to refill bullets of a weapon.
    Author:
    Tan Wei Li
